ARMOR_TOUGHNESS.description: Armor durability bonus of an Entity.

BLOCK_BREAK_SPEED.description: Block break speed of a Player.

BLOCK_INTERACTION_RANGE.description: The block reach distance of a Player.

BURNING_TIME.description: How long an entity remains burning after ignition.

ENTITY_INTERACTION_RANGE.description: The entity reach distance of a Player.

FALL_DAMAGE_MULTIPLIER.description: The fall damage multiplier of an Entity.

FOLLOW_RANGE.description: Range at which an Entity will follow others.

GRAVITY.description: The gravity applied to an Entity.

JUMP_STRENGTH.description: Strength with which an Entity will jump.

KNOCKBACK_RESISTANCE.description: Resistance of an Entity to knockback.

SAFE_FALL_DISTANCE.description: The distance which an Entity can fall without damage.

SCALE.description: The relative scale of an Entity.

SPAWN_REINFORCEMENTS.description: Chance of a zombie to spawn reinforcements.

STEP_HEIGHT.description: The height which an Entity can walk over.

TEMPT_RANGE.description: Range at which mobs will be tempted by items.
